mainText:
Employees of Apple you have big shoes to fill!!!  One of the greatest visionaries has passed away but I know he has passed on his skills and passions to everyone that has crossed his path.  Apple has grown to be much more than a person it is now a way of life.  

Thank you, Steve Jobs for making my life so much easier with the technology you envisioned and masterminded.  My goal in business is to follow your example.
author: Kirt
